title: Omelette Potta Lyrics Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom (2012) Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Omelette Potta
Singer: Ved Shanker, Sugavanam
Lyrics: Ved Shankar

Movie: Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom (2012)
Music: Ved Shankar

Omelette Potta Muttaya kaanom
Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom

Poota thorandha veeetak kaanom
Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom

Uchchi veyilla nizhazha kaanom
Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom

Muzhichi paarthaen night-a kaanon
Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom

Saraku adichaa bayatha kaanom
Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom

Ingathaan vachchaen engayo kaanom
Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom

Phone-a potta balance kaanom
Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom

Mudhalum kaanom mudivum kaanom
Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom

In-between something missing
In-between something missing
In-between something missing.
missing ..missing..missing...
